column4: can someone tell me www.google.com 's ip? for some reason my dns is not resolving it, but works otherwise
Google has many IP's, it picks the one closest to you, so depending on your location, it could be very different from the IP I have for google.
powertool08, basically all domain addresses are working but google. But thanks, that IP works fine here. and now if I only remember what I was searching for ...
All of google's IP's would work for you, but the closer ones would work faster, though its probably a negligible difference.
